title: Johnson imposes COVID-19 'Plan B' in England to contain Omicron
content:
1. Johnson imposes COVID-19 'Plan B' in England to contain Omicron  Reuters UK
  2. Britain Introduces 'Plan B' Covid Measures to Tackle Omicron  The New York Times
  3. UK Tightens Covid Restrictions to Curb Omicron's Spread; Issues WFH Guidance  Bloomberg
  4. Work From Home, Mandatory Masks And “Covid Passports”: Boris Johnson Sets Out UK “Plan B” As Omicron Cases Soar  Deadline
  5. UK Covid live: Met police will not investigate No 10 Christmas party allegations  The Guardian

localize.title: ジョンソン氏、オミクロンを封じ込めるためにイギリスでCOVID-19の「プランB」を実施
